name: Laptop MacBook Wood Stand Ergonomic Computer Holder, Woodworking Gift, Workspace Desk Accessories, Gift for Men, Office Desk Accessory
description:
Our wooden Laptop Stand guarantees you comfort and brings your workspace to new ergonomic heights. The stand elevates your device 15 cm to eye level allowing you to straighten your back, preventing the risk of neck and lower-back pain. The stand frees up space underneath your laptop providing extra storage.

The stand elevates your laptop to eye level which makes it an ergonomic solution for your workspace.

Thanks to our unique wood joining technique, the Laptop Stand can handle weight up to 100kg (220lbs).

FEATURES:
• boost your performance - rise your laptop to the perfect working angle,  reduce eye and neck strain
• natural oil finish - incredibly natural look and feel of the stand
• handcrafted from real solid wood
• bottom cork protection pads - makes no scratches

DIMENSIONS:
- 13-14" version:
• length: 45 cm (17.7 inch)
• width: 22 cm (8.7 inch)
• height: 14 cm (5.5 inch)
• tabletop measurement: 31 x 20 cm (12.2 x 7.9 inch)
• tabletop thickness: 1.8 cm (0.7 inch)
- 15-16" version:
• length: 50 cm (19.7 inch)
• width: 25 cm (9.8 inch)
• height: 15 cm (5.9 inch)
• tabletop measurement: 36 x 23 cm (14.2 x 9.1 inch)
• tabletop thickness: 1.8 cm (0.7 inch)

BUY ONE, PLANT ONE
Yes! It's that simple! You buy 1 product from us, we plant 1 tree! You can do something good for the environment while buying product for yourself. Isn’t that great?!
category: Electronics & Accessories < Docking & Stands < Laptop Trays & Stands

review.reviewBody: Great product and an easy solution for raising your laptop to get into a comfortable position. It turned out too high for me (because my desk is already pretty big), but Mateusz offered great service and allowed me to return the product. Thanks!

Excellent quality, super fast shipping, perfect height. This is the 2nd stand that we've purchased. Esty Seller is very professional, great with communication, product was packaged very well. You will not be disappointed.
Great quality and very well made.

name: Oakywood Dual Laptop Stand Wood, Vertical Adjustable Macbook Double Dock Stand, Desk Organizer for Home Office, Valentine gift for Him
description:
The Dual Laptop Dock is an innovative solution for your desk organization. The stand allows you to simultaneously store two devices: laptops or tablets up to 24mm (0.95 inch) thick. Streamline your work by securely storing your gadgets, organizing your desk space, and smoothly switching between the two devices.

Want it PERSONALIZED? Add this - https://www.etsy.com/listing/662276951

The micro-suction technology allows you to control the stand with one hand while it sits securely on your desk.

Lined with soft wool felt and flock, the wooden laptop stand protects your devices from scratching and doesn’t block ventilation.

FEATURES:
• supports two devices up to 24mm (0.94 inch) thick and offers adjustable width for a secure fit
• hand-polished solid oak or walnut wood
• solid aluminum base - stable & safe
• one-hand operation - micro-suction tape technology
• soft wool felt and flock on the inside protects your devices
• unique geometric design

DIMENSIONS:
• Length: 18 cm (7.1 inch)
• Width: 11.3 cm (4.5 inch)
• Height: 4 cm (4.5 inch)
• Device thickness: 0.6 cm - 2.4 cm (0.2 inch - 0.94 inch)

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION:
• Wood is a natural material, thus each individual product may slightly vary in color
• Handcrafted in Poland, EU

1 PRODUCT = 1 TREE
Yes! It's that simple! You buy 1 product from us, and we plant 1 tree! You can do something good for the environment while buying products for yourself. Isn’t that great?!

review.reviewBody: Top product and great service. Everything is fine!
Love how this is adjustable to fit different laptop styles; great design.

I love my laptop holder so much! It’s such a beautiful piece of wood and fits my HP laptop perfectly. My laptop is thicker than my iPad, so I like that I can adjust both sides to the right measurements for them. Don’t hesitate to purchase. You won’t regret it!
This was a gift for my boyfriend and he loved it. It looks just like the picture and is beautiful wood. It’s definitely a perk that it’s adjustable to fit multiple sizes of laptops/tablets.

name: Laptop Stand, Fold Away Bed Tray, Real Wood, Portable Foldable Lap Desk, Breakfast Serving Tray, Multifunctional Stand, Work From Home Gift
description:
★ MULTI-PURPOSE LAPTOP TRAY - This wood laptop table is designed to easily use your laptop in bed, seat, travel and anywhere you want. It can be an activity table for children, a breakfast tray in bed or a computer stand, a food tray while doing crafts or on the sofa. The wood laptop table has 2 different size options to choose according to your need. This versatile laptop tray will be indispensable! 

● FOLDABLE DESIGN - The portable laptop desk has a foldable design. This way, when not in use, you can easily store it without taking up too much space. At the same time, the edges of the product are designed to be curved so as not to harm you. Curved edges, functionality and ergonomic design will make your use easier. 

● AIRFLOW & HUMAN HEALTH - For the health of your laptop, there are holes that allow airflow to ensure that your laptop receives air and does not shorten its life. At the same time, this laptop stand is designed to keep your laptop at the right height. Correct posture when working on your laptop is crucial for both your spine health and your neck health. Thanks to this laptop stand, you will experience healthy laptop use. 

● QUALITY LAP DESK & SAFETY WOOD - Our real wood products are coated with natural teak oil, a nourishing and protective oil that penetrates deeply into the wood, giving it water repellent properties. There are no additives in our wood products. Applied teak oil has permission to be applied in children's toys. En 71/3 Standard (Safety of Toys/Migration of some Elements) 

● BENEFITS OF WOOD & GIFT Research on the effect of wood clearly shows that the presence of wood has positive effects; it lowers blood pressure, pulse and stress compared to other materials. It has a positive effect on one's emotional state. So this wooden laptop stand is a very nice gift for you and your loved ones!

Dimensions:
• Length x Width: 21.8 x 11.8 in (55.6 x 30 cm) 
• Top Surface: 16.5 x 11.1 in (42 x 28.2 cm)
• Height: 7.4 in (18.8 cm)

It is a handmade product. Made from real premium solid wood.
This product does not contain harmful chemicals.
It's NOT PLYWOOD.

★ Gift recommendations of this wood laptop stand:
● Gift for him
● Gift for her
● Father's day gift
● Mother's day gift
● Valentine's day gift
● Wedding anniversary gift
● Christmas gift
● New home gift

review.reviewBody: The wood is beautiful and the stand definitely fulfills its purpose, though it could be finished better. The table legs are not perfectly aligned and not sanded on the bottom so they can catch on fabric.
Great gift! My parter was so happy :)
Super impressed!! Cannot believe the quality. Will absolutely be making more purchases!
nice product! Quick shipping good quality.
